entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow at times mixed with rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
